scripts.build: pnpm run build:wasm && pnpm i && pnpm run cleanup && tsc --project "tsconfig-node.json" && webpack && pnpm run cleanup
scripts.build:wasm: wasm-pack build --target bundler --out-dir ../pkg_combo/bundler ../rust_src && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-dir ../pkg_combo/nodejs ../rust_src
